name: generator-jhipster-administration-database
description: This module allows you to generate .yml files allowing you to administrate your production database (managing databases likephpmyadmin). For the moment the following databases are supported : MYSQL, POSTGRESQL, MONGODB, MARIADB.

scripts.release: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -a -m "Update to %s" && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -a -m "Update to %s" && npm run release
scripts.release:major: npm version major -a -m "Update to %s" && npm run release
